title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and model library.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs to chat with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node.js and browsers via a lightweight wrapper.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for use in chains, agents, RAG pipelines and tool-calling workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring markdown, code highlighting, model management and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering fluent builders, streaming chat completions, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API, supporting chat, embeddings and model operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with ergonomic commands for chatting, pulling and listing models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline copilots and chat panels.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models, packaged for Windows, macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that connects to Ollama, demonstrating session state, streaming responses and model selection widgets.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into channels, supports slash commands and per-guild model settings.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node that enables no-code workflows to query local Ollama models for tasks like summarization or translation.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generated REST bindings and idiomatic streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+, IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency injection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container with GPU passthrough for CI-based LLM testing.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG reference implementation using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a sidebar chat powered by Ollama and can summarize or rewrite selected notes.
